data.text:
Pop Culture References of Wizard101

Jared Banks, Marleybone Jeweler – Jared Banks, Senior Game Designer for KI

http://www.wizard101central.com/wiki/NPC:Jared_Banks#ixzz7YYlAC8Jb

http://www.wizard101central.com/wiki/Quest:Reckless_Necklace#axzz7Yk4puK5F

https://www.linkedin.com/in/jared-banks-a65696b/

https://youtu.be/y8X0WohHLlQ

Jared Banks is the “Jeweler” in Marleybone. He is located in Regent’s Square, inside the Jack Russell Jewelers shop, on the west side of Market Square. When you’ve finished the side quest “Reckless Necklace” Ms. Marphely exclaims “You went to Jared’s”

Jared is a two-pronged Pop Culture reference; the first is to Kings Isle game designer Jared Banks, the second is to American jewelry store chain Jared.

In the “Reckless Necklace” Quest, Ms. Marphely is quite pleased that you took your jewelry business to Jared’s

Jared Banks has been working at KingsIsle for over fifteen years as a game designer from 2007-2012 and as a Senior Game Designer from 2012 to Present.

Click the YouTube link for a commercial from Jared the Galleria of Jewelry.

This is the fiftieth article chronicling the #W101PopCulture references starting in Wizard City and the seventh Marleybone article. The current list of all the (known) Marleybone references are located here.

Although I am well versed in Pop Culture references but I do not claim to have caught them all. Let me know your favorites in the comments and if I’ve missed one you caught, let me know so I can add it to the list.

Text for this article is excerpted from the linked wiki pages

Jared Banks, the Jeweler image is from Wizard101, and is copyright of KingsIsle Entertainment.

Jared Banks the Game Designer image is from his LinkedIn page.
